headline: Why The Narrative Around PPL Is Changing With New Analyst Targets And Clean Energy Growth
summary: PPL Corp.’s Fair Value Estimate has inched up, now reaching $38.54 from a previous $38.31, following a fresh round of Street research and target adjustments. Recent analyst commentary underscores divided viewpoints, with some highlighting the resilience of utilities and potential growth from clean energy initiatives. Others urge caution and have moderated expectations for rapid price appreciation. Stay tuned to discover how ongoing shifts in sector sentiment might impact future valuations and...
